pageContext.claim: “Just out: MEDIAN HOUSEHOLD INCOME IS AT THE HIGHEST POINT EVER, EVER, EVER! How about saying it this way, IN THE HISTORY OF OUR COUNTRY!”
pageContext.analysis: Real median household income is the highest it has been since 1984, according to data from the U.S. Census Bureau. However, it is not statistically higher in 2018 than it had been in 2017. So, it's misleading to say it is at "the highest point ever." Plus, the bureau {suggests caution} in this comparison because there were changes to the survey.
